name: Little Cat Fur Thief: Boo’s Skate Race Fun Food Ride - Free
name_original: Little Cat Fur Thief: Boo’s Skate Race Fun Food Ride - Free
description:
It's a crazy fast paced action feline skateboard game ! Boo is a hungry cat that needs to gather lots of food to survive the next few months ! It's a dangerous quest, but you're up for it ! Help Boo find lots of food, fishes, hot-dog, ham and other meat, it's an incredible meal waiting for you ! All you have to do is get on your skateboard and pick them all up.

The only worries is that there are a lot of traps, spinning saw, spiky balls and pointy sharp metal spike, they are all so dangerous that you might not survive your trip ! So be careful, and since you hate water you'll try not to fall in the deep water, if do you, you'll have to start all over again !

The only way not to start all the way back from the beginning is by picking up sardines buckets, their smell will guide you right back where you first picked them up ! Try to reach the best score by having the most points, little ham doesn't pay off much but there is lots of them, bigger food are rarer but give you lot more point.

Have fun playing 'Little Cat Fur Thief' and help Boo complete his mission !

Send us your most welcome comments!
You can leave them at: support@meilleursjeuxmobiles.com
